alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 27 at 3:59AM MDT until October 28 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Feet County. * WHEN...Until midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Embedded thunderstorms this afternoon could cause locally intense snowfall rates and rapidly deteriorating travel conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft
